consoleOutputText:
*you ask about RB* 
 Loralei: No, I'm sorry, I've never heard of him. *you ask about City of Gods* 
 Loralei: Everyone's heard of the City of Gods. It's just a myth though. Lord knows we're neither lucky nor strong enough to venture out there even if we tried. 
 *you ask about monsters* 
 Loralei: Be careful of the monsters out there. Anyone who's ventured further than a few miles outside this village was killed. 
 *You can approach another villager but the entire village appears wary and scared of your arrival.*
